All Classes

Class Summary
Class Description
ActionCard
this class is another subclass of Card super class, but unlike NormalCard subclass, this class(mainly its subclasses) has some important effects on the game
BonusPlayCard
this is a subclass of ActionCard class and is used whenever we have "8 card" it gives to player another chance to play (if he has any matching card to the top card)
Card
this a super class for any kind of card inside this game abstract things about every card is written inside this class, including type, color and score
CardDeck
this class is for making 52 cards of game
ChangeColorCard
this is a subclass of ActionCard class and is represents act of "B card" and can change color of top card even it doesn't match with it
ChangeDirectionCard
this is a subclass of ActionCard class and represents "card type 10" and it's duty is to change the direction of the game
GameLaunch
this class manages the whole game and all essential actions are done by this class
GiveAwayCard
this is a subclass of ActionCard class and is used whenever a "7 black card" is used whenever an instance of this class is used, GameLaunch must motivate player to give a card to another player
Main  
NormalCard
this class is a subclass of Card super class instances of ths class have no specific effect on game
Player
this class is for saving cards of every player and having access to them
PrintCards
this class is responsible for printing cards of player and top card
RandomPick2Card
this is a subclass of ActionCard class and is used whenever a "7 (except black) card" is used the main action of ths card is written inside GameLaunch class, GameLaunch.doCardOperation(Card) method, but in general, this card gives 2 cards to next player as punishment
RandomPick4card
this is a subclass of ActionCard class and is used whenever a "7 black card" is used the main action of ths card is written inside GameLaunch class, GameLaunch.doCardOperation(Card) method, but in general, this card gives 4 cards to next player as punishment
SkipCard
this is a subclass of ActionCard class and its duty is to skip one player
